snippet.title: They Came From Below - We Happy Few DLC Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
James & Roger return in an all-new We Happy Few story. Wellington Wells stands besieged by a robot uprising, but the mechanized menace isn't the only thing threatening to tear our pair apart. Play as Roger and team up with your boyfriend James to Find Dr. Faraday, explore a vast underground laboratory, and discover the source of the robot invaders before it's too late!

Buy the season pass below: 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/919000/We_Happy_Few__Season_Pass/
Xbox One (Play Anywhere): https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/we-happy-few-season-pass/bqnrbjthh8d9?activetab=pivot:overviewtab
PlayStation4 (Americas): https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP0292-CUSA09406_00-WEHAPPYFEWSP0000 
PlayStation4 (Europe): https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP0290-CUSA09424_00-WEHAPPYFEWSP0000
